description: SSO login button is not present on the-internet login page — this site uses form auth only
rootCause: The element #sso-login-button does not exist on this page. The-internet uses standard form authentication only — there is no SSO integration.

actionPlan.planSummary: Remove the SSO login step and use the standard username/password form instead

actions.description: Skip the SSO login attempt — this page does not support SSO
